solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public int countPrimes(int n) {--newline--        boolean[] notPrime = new boolean[n];--newline--        int count = 0;--newline--        for (int i = 2; i < n; i++) {--newline--            if (notPrime[i] == false) {--newline--                count++;--newline--                for (int j = 2; i*j < n; j++) {--newline--                    notPrime[i*j] = true;--newline--                }--newline--            }--newline--        }--newline--        --newline--        return count;--newline--    }--newline--}
